author: morciuch
msg: Fixed paging in Psml Browser when page size is exceeded (see Bugzilla issue # 14747). Since the window iterator is now cached, the user may have to click the Refresh button to see any external psml changes.

author: morciuch
msg: JSP clean up part 1 (see Bugzilla issues 5441 and 5442)
Layout, navigation and screen templates have been modified to match look, feel and functionality of their Velocity counterparts. Removed redundant language specific templates (en and de).

author: taylor
msg: - upgrade to release candidates: turbine 2.2, torque 3.0

author: taylor
msg: new torque build, updated jar reference to torque-2.2

author: morciuch
msg: Modified changePassword method to display correct localized error message upon exception
